about_the_game:
Gin - The Silver Wind is a retro inspired platformer that features its own take on classic controls seen in games from the late 80s and early 90s. Take control of Gin and plan your jumps with precision as you wind through stages filled with tight platforming sections and deadly hazards!




This game features a jumping movement similar to certain old-school games, having a fixed arch. You will have to master the double jump in order to maneuver through the stages and successfully avoid enemies and hazards as you plan your position ahead.




Gin can attack with his blade to cut through enemies and objects with the power of the wind. You can also use your blade to hook onto surfaces, allowing you to climb walls and help you out in a pinch.




Use the Tornado Technique and leap forward as you become immune to any harm while slicing any enemies that get in your way or use it as an extra option for maneuvering mid-air.




Dealing damage to enemies fills up your Strain Circle, fill it up and activate Strain Mode to speed up the use of the tornado. Master all of Gin's tools and become as nimble as the Silver Wind himself!
